alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Prince Georges; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:57PM EST until February 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, with up to 4 inches locally. * WHERE...The District of Columbia, portions of central, northeast and northern Maryland and central, northern and northwest Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest accumulations will be on non- paved surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Anne Arundel; Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Prince Georges; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
